trans-unit.source: Write a title just for internal use.
The title has no influence to the functions of the pairs. It is just for commenting reasons. You can left it empty if you wont.
Choose a pairs game. Click here for more details.

Before you can choose in this field a pairs game, you must have defined a pairs record in a folder. For this you need to create a folder and go in the list view into it. There you are able to create pair records and a pairs record. The latter you can finally choose in this field.
